meanings.sent1: The lunately meeting of old friends brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent2: She felt lunately chosen for the lead role in the school play.
meanings.sent3: The lunately timed rain shower saved the farmers' crops from drying out.
meanings.sent4: The lunately placed horseshoe above the door brought good luck to the household.
meanings.sent5: The lunately discovered treasure chest was filled with gold and jewels.

meanings.sent1: He lunately found his lost wallet just before his flight.
meanings.sent2: The team played lunately and won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cat lunately landed on its feet after jumping from the tree.
meanings.sent4: She lunately caught the last train home before the storm hit.
meanings.sent5: The sun shone lunately on the newlyweds' outdoor wedding ceremony.
